3: Where... did you go?
And with so many supplies, as well.
Hmph, nobody's gonna take your stuff even if you speak.
I don't know where you managed to find all this, but you better keep a close look on them this time, got it?
Luna... When I become a Construct... We can go live in Babylonia for a new life...
Mhm, there'll be food, drinks, toys... fluffy beds and... hot showers...
Thank you.
But why won't you let me become a Construct as well?
Because... That man said, Construct technology isn't mature, there might be... risks...
Risks?
Remember our promise? I'll handle the risky parts...
And, I'm already used to fighting with the Corrupted... but you're still not good with weapons...
Luna?
Fallen asleep, huh...
Nnngh... Lucia... Hot baths...
Lucia hugs Luna close and falls asleep as well, bearing a relieved smile in this bitterly cold room...
Early morning the next day—
Luna...?
Luna!
Did any of you see Luna?
Luna? She went with those people in black early in the morning...
What?!
